title: How to Do the Pokémon Shop Questionnaire

steps.headline: Walk into any Poke-mart.
steps.description: Let's take Petalburg for an example.

steps.headline: Walk two steps up and two steps over.
steps.description: You should discover something that looks like a paper.

steps.headline: Click the "Yes" button after the computer had asked "Fill out questionnaire?"
steps.description: Enter the words "Link together with all". It is easier to find them when looking by alphabetical order.

steps.headline: Exit the questionnaire.
steps.description: The store clerk will look at you with an exclamation over his head. This person will say you have unlocked the mystery gift. However, keep in mind that this is only possible if you have one or two wireless adapter of a link cable.

steps.headline: Unlock the mystery gift once your friend has arrived.
Turn on game.
steps.description: Instead of pressing start game, there will be the option to turn on the mystery gift. Click it, and you and your friend will receive a gift!

text: Walk into any Poke-mart. Let's take Petalburg for an example. Walk two steps up and two steps over. You should discover something that looks like a paper. Click the "Yes" button after the computer had asked "Fill out questionnaire?" Enter the words "Link together with all". It is easier to find them when looking by alphabetical order. Exit the questionnaire. The store clerk will look at you with an exclamation over his head. This person will say you have unlocked the mystery gift. However, keep in mind that this is only possible if you have one or two wireless adapter of a link cable. Unlock the mystery gift once your friend has arrived.  Insert the adapters/cable.  Turn on game. Instead of pressing start game, there will be the option to turn on the mystery gift. Click it, and you and your friend will receive a gift!
sentences: Let's take Petalburg for an example.
Walk two steps up and two steps over.
You should discover something that looks like a paper.
Click the "Yes" button after the computer had asked "Fill out questionnaire?"
Enter the words "Link together with all".
It is easier to find them when looking by alphabetical order.
The store clerk will look at you with an exclamation over his head.
This person will say you have unlocked the mystery gift.
However, keep in mind that this is only possible if you have one or two wireless adapter of a link cable.
Unlock the mystery gift once your friend has arrived.
Instead of pressing start game, there will be the option to turn on the mystery gift.
Click it, and you and your friend will receive a gift!
